June 10, 2014

A Starting Point

Here we are. This is the basis for our new website. But don’t get excited. This is not the final design! It’s just something we put together to serve as a placeholder for updates and other info while the website is being made.

So what’s happening here? This is just a quick Jekyll website hosted on GitHub Pages. We’ve used Bootstrap to get things up and running quickly. Feel free to have a look at the code.

The Speaker Application and Become a Sponsor forms are powered by Wufoo, and the Join the Group form is hooked up to our Mailchimp account (which we’ll use as the basis for our membership database).

Wait a sec. Who’s doing this?

As we said in the Kickstarter Campaign, we’re running this like a regular client project (except that we’re posting a lot of details to the public), so the team at Nine Labs is leading the charge.

We have J Cornelius as Project Manager, Brad Weaver as UX and Creative Lead, Moses Ngone as Technical Lead, and Jason Ottinger as Design Lead.

Want to help out? Great! We’ll certainly need help as things move along. Send me an email with your skills and what you’d like to do to help.

Sketching Things Out

Here are a few sketches Brad has been working on showing various ideas for how the home page, events list, and profile page might lay out.

Next Up

We’ll be working on the wireframes and process workflows next.

That’s all for now. Thanks for your support!

— J Cornelius
